name: Leatherworker
description: A unique or uncategorized site; adventurers will discover unpredictable opportunities or dangers.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the rich scent of leather and the sharp tang of tanning chemicals. The sound of tools working on hides and the rhythmic work of leather crafting creates a methodical, skilled atmosphere. The air carries the promise of durability and the essential nature of leather goods in daily life.
